long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download Photos and Videos from Instagram Post, Reels, TV, Stories

Download Instagram Photo and Video. Save IG Story, Reels or Posts. Supports single and mass Download from Instagram. IG Downloader

Download for Instagram

Instagram Downloader provides easy way to download any Instagram Photo or Video from IG to your computer. It also supports Repost feature to Feed or Stories. 

My Instagram Download Tool supports single or mass download from Instagram, you can save hundreds of photos or videos from any Instagram account in just a few moments. You can download images of videos from your own account or anyone else's account, as Instagram Downloader has both:
-	Single Download option
-	Mass Download option

Instagram Downloader is a simple and powerful tool with numerous features making your user experience even better. You can save any visual content from IG:
-	Reels. Mass and single download
-	Stories. Video or Image. Mass and single download
-	Posts. Video or Image, one or more

The main goal of my Instagram Downloader is to make your social experience easier and more convenient. For this I implemented a few very handy features like:
-	Repost Photo or Video from Instagram feed or any profile page
-	Bulk Download to get all IG Photos and Videos from a user or feed. You can select how many files you want to get to your device
-	Downloading Instagram Stories, one-by-one or all of them with one single click

Please NOTE: Instagram Downloader does not belong or related to Instagram Inc. in any ways. The extension is developed and maintained independently. My extension is a wrapper to original web application.
